original_text: In this paper, three different approaches for implementing a quantum search algorithm by adiabatic evolution are shown. As expected, either one of them can provide a quadratic speed up as opposed to the classical search algorithm. This implies that adiabatic evolution based quantum computation gives more feasibilities than the quantum circuit model, although the equivalence between them has already been proven in the corresponding literature.
original_translation: En este documento se muestran tres enfoques diferentes para implementar un algoritmo de búsqueda cuántica mediante evolución adiabática. Como era de esperar, cualquiera de ellos puede proporcionar una aceleración cuadrática en comparación con el algoritmo de búsqueda clásico. Esto implica que la computación cuántica basada en la evolución adiabática ofrece más posibilidades que el modelo de circuito cuántico, aunque la equivalencia entre ellos ya ha sido demostrada en la literatura correspondiente.
original_sentences: In this paper, three different approaches for implementing a quantum search algorithm by adiabatic evolution are shown.
As expected, either one of them can provide a quadratic speed up as opposed to the classical search algorithm.

This implies that adiabatic evolution based quantum computation gives more feasibilities than the quantum circuit model, although the equivalence between them has already been proven in the corresponding literature.
